#summary USB Driver for Sciphone N19
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

USB Driver for Sciphone N19


= Details =

Go to [http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html] and download SDK.

After installing the SDK, download USB driver for windows.

Then, replace android_winusb.inf with the one from this site: [http://custom-android-sciphone-n19.googlecode.com/files/android_winusb.inf]

The driver will now recognize N19.
